segment: Healthcare Facilities - Decision Makers with Emails
target_area: Las Vegas / Henderson / North Las Vegas, NV
source: LinkedIn profiles, Google search, CMS Medicare database, hospital websites, ZoomInfo snippets, AirNav data, UMC board minutes

email_verification_notes.verified: Email confirmed via public source (website, document, or database)
email_verification_notes.pattern_confirmed: Domain email pattern verified via known addresses; name applied to pattern
email_verification_notes.domain_only: Company email domain known; contact name identified but email constructed from pattern only

prospects.facility_type: Level I Trauma Center / Public Hospital
prospects.address: 1800 W Charleston Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89102
prospects.notes: COO is best initial contact for vending/amenity services at UMC. Name confirmed via UMC governing board minutes (Feb 2025). Public hospital = may require RFP process. Biggest potential contract in the valley. 24/7 ER, massive foot traffic.

prospects.facility_type: Level I Trauma Center / Public Hospital
prospects.address: 1800 W Charleston Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89102
prospects.notes: Direct facilities contact at UMC. Email confirmed via ZoomInfo (s***@umcsn.com). Project Manager in Facilities Dept - ideal contact for smart market placement discussions.

prospects.facility_type: Level I Trauma Center / Public Hospital
prospects.address: 1800 W Charleston Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89102
prospects.notes: Email CONFIRMED on AirNav.com heliport listing. Alt phone: (702) 972-1618. Facilities operations contact - good entry point for vending/amenity discussions.

prospects.address: 1050 W Galleria Dr, Henderson, NV 89011
prospects.parent_system: Valley Health System / Universal Health Services (UHS)
prospects.notes: NVCBO@uhsinc.com confirmed on Henderson Hospital and Centennial Hills Hospital websites. Start here for vendor approval process across ALL Valley Health System hospitals (6 hospitals + 7 freestanding ERs). Henderson is HOME BASE for Kande VendTech.

prospects.address: 8801 W Sahara Ave, Las Vegas, NV 89117
prospects.notes: Regional VP named in Nevada Hospital Association press release about Valley Health System. System-wide deal target: 6 acute care hospitals + West Henderson Hospital (newest, opened 2024) + 7 freestanding ERs + Spring Mountain Treatment Center. UHS email format confirmed via NVCBO@uhsinc.com.

prospects.address: 6900 N Durango Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89149
prospects.notes: Route through NVCBO for vendor access. 339 beds, 354K sq ft. Opened 2008. Active facility management hiring (LinkedIn posting for Manager of Facility Management). Large campus = multiple machine placement opportunities.

prospects.address: 657 N Town Center Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89144
prospects.notes: Summerlin = wealthiest area of Las Vegas. Premium vending products command higher prices. Bundle with other UHS hospitals for system-wide deal.

prospects.address: 5400 S Rainbow Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89118
prospects.notes: Southwest LV location. Part of UHS system-wide opportunity.

prospects.address: 1171 W Horizon Ridge Pkwy, Henderson, NV 89012
prospects.notes: NEWEST Valley Health System hospital (opened 2024). New facility = NO entrenched vending vendor. Henderson location = Kande home base. Priority target!

prospects.facility_type: Level II Trauma / Acute Care Hospital
prospects.address: 3186 S Maryland Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89109
prospects.notes: Largest hospital in Nevada. HCA Healthcare may have existing national vending contracts. Check for local supplement opportunities. Break rooms, waiting areas, ER waiting room. HCA email domain: hcahealthcare.com

prospects.address: 3100 N Tenaya Way, Las Vegas, NV 89128
prospects.notes: Currently hiring Manager of Facility Management (LinkedIn job posting Dec 2025). Good timing to approach - new facility manager will need vendors. HCA property.

prospects.address: 9300 W Sunset Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89148
prospects.contact_title: Manager of Facility Management and Safety
prospects.notes: Also currently hiring Manager of Facility Management (LinkedIn Jan 2026). 80-bed behavioral health unit = secure area vending needs. Good time to pitch to incoming manager.

prospects.address: 3001 St. Rose Pkwy, Henderson, NV 89052
prospects.notes: Henderson location. Dignity Health email: @dignityhealth.org. Large campus. Bundle with Rose de Lima and San Martin campuses for triple deal. Henderson's only pediatric ER.

prospects.company: Dignity Health - St. Rose Dominican, San Martin Campus
prospects.address: 8280 W Warm Springs Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89113
prospects.notes: Newsweek ranked #1 hospital in Nevada (2026). High prestige = high standards for vending quality. Dignity email: @dignityhealth.org.

prospects.address: 3021 W Horizon Ridge Pkwy, Henderson, NV 89052
prospects.notes: Henderson location! Currently hiring Director of Facility Operations (LinkedIn posting). Acadia Healthcare parent. Behavioral health = secure area, patients can't leave = captive audience for vending. Email domain: @acadiahealthcare.com

prospects.company: DaVita South Las Vegas Dialysis Center
prospects.address: 6330 S Pecos Rd #600, Las Vegas, NV 89120
prospects.notes: Confirmed on LinkedIn: Facility Administrator of DaVita South Las Vegas Dialysis Center. Dialysis patients sit 3-4 hours per session, 3x/week = captive audience. DaVita has 15+ centers in Las Vegas metro. Win one = referral to others.

prospects.address: Various Las Vegas locations
prospects.notes: LinkedIn confirmed: Facility Administrator at DaVita Kidney Care, Las Vegas. DaVita email format: firstname.lastname@davita.com.

prospects.address: Various Las Vegas locations
prospects.notes: LinkedIn: DaVita Kidney Care Las Vegas since Aug 2023, appears to be Group FA overseeing multiple centers. Higher-level contact could unlock multiple locations.

prospects.address: Las Vegas, NV (San Martin area)
prospects.notes: LinkedIn confirmed: Executive Director of San Martin Senior Living. Also manages Legacies at San Martin Memory Care. Senior living = staff, visitors, and mobile residents all need refreshment access.

prospects.address: Las Vegas, NV
prospects.notes: Licensed Residential Facility Administrator. Executive Director in Las Vegas metro. Cascade Living Group = multi-facility operator, could be portfolio deal.

prospects.address: Henderson/Las Vegas, NV
prospects.notes: Licensed NHA leading a NEW BUILD skilled nursing facility in Las Vegas. Henderson-based. New facility = no existing vendor. PRIORITY target - get in early before another vendor claims it.

prospects.address: Las Vegas, NV
prospects.notes: Marquis Companies is a multi-state senior living operator. Jacob Atwood is Administrator in Las Vegas. National chain = potential for portfolio deal if Las Vegas location succeeds.

prospects.company: Life Care Centers of America (Las Vegas)
prospects.address: Las Vegas, NV
prospects.notes: Life Care Centers is one of largest SNF chains in US. Clarissa Dewese is Executive Director / Licensed Skilled Nursing Administrator in Las Vegas metro. Landing this account could open doors to 200+ Life Care locations nationally.

prospects.address: Las Vegas, NV
prospects.notes: Licensed NHA at Fundamental in Las Vegas. 24/7 staff = vending demand especially nights/weekends when cafeteria is closed.

prospects.address: Las Vegas, NV
prospects.notes: NeuroRestorative provides brain injury and rehab services. Part of Sevita (formerly The MENTOR Network). Patients in long-term rehab = captive audience.

prospects.address: 2832 S Maryland Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89109
prospects.notes: CMS Medicare data: 79 beds, 4-star overall rating, 5-star health inspection. Near Sunrise Hospital on Maryland Pkwy. Independent operator = no corporate red tape. Call main line and ask for administrator.

prospects.address: 5538 W Duncan Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89130
prospects.notes: CMS data: 144 beds, part of Empres/Evergreen chain (42 facilities). 24/7 staff operations. Large facility = multiple vending placement opportunities. Chain operator = if we win one, could scale to 42 locations.

prospects.address: 6900 N Pecos Rd, North Las Vegas, NV 89086
prospects.notes: Named in NHA press release as VASNHS Director/CEO. VA hospitals are federal = may require GSA/Randolph-Sheppard process. But massive foot traffic and 24/7 operations. Email domain: @va.gov. Vending may be handled by canteen service.

prospects.address: 1555 W Horizon Ridge Pkwy, Henderson, NV 89012
prospects.notes: Henderson location. 4.4 stars on Caring.com. Sunrise Senior Living is a major national brand. Staff + visitors + mobile residents. Email domain: @sunriseseniorliving.com

prospects.address: 3450 N Buffalo Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89129
prospects.notes: 155-bed SNF. Staff working 24/7 shifts = high vending demand especially nights/weekends when cafeteria closed. Break room placement is key.

prospects.address: 8501 Del Webb Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89134
prospects.notes: 225 rooms - one of the largest SNFs in the area. Del Webb / Summerlin area = upscale. Established 2006. Multiple machine placement opportunities.

Alorah Healthcare (NEW BUILD SNF, no vendor yet, Henderson)

tier1_immediate: Email Stephanie Ortiz at UMC re: smart market for staff break rooms and waiting areas
Email NVCBO@uhsinc.com to start Valley Health System vendor approval process
Pop-in at West Henderson Hospital (new facility, Henderson, no vendor)
Pop-in at Seven Hills BH (Henderson, new facility director being hired)
Email Wesley Molden at DaVita re: vending for dialysis waiting areas
tier2_this_week: Call UMC main line, ask for Director of Facilities by name
Visit Dan Hills at Alorah Healthcare new build site
Call Henderson Hospital and ask for local facilities contact
Email DaVita Group FAs (Angela Weinstock, Laurence Fortes)
tier3_this_month: Research HCA Healthcare local contacts at Sunrise/MountainView/Southern Hills
Visit senior living facilities in person with gift baskets
Register as vendor with Clark County for UMC public bid process
Contact VA canteen service for VASNHS opportunity
outreach_strategy.pitch_angle: Modern AI-powered smart market with healthy options for staff wellness, cashless payment, guaranteed 24/7 uptime with local service commitment. We're local - you can call us anytime.
outreach_strategy.key_insight: Valley Health System (UHS) = 6 hospitals + 1 new hospital + 7 freestanding ERs + treatment center. Single vendor relationship through NVCBO@uhsinc.com could yield 15+ locations. This is the WHALE account for healthcare.
